output_list.reason: The minting function allows an integer overflow, enabling the owner to mint an arbitrary large amount of tokens, devaluing the token.
The function allows unauthorized transfers by checking only the sender's balance and allowance, not the receiver's balance.
The owner can be transferred to any address, allowing the attacker to take control of the contract.
The function allows an integer overflow, enabling the attacker to increase the balance of the attacker, causing a denial of service.
